hero.title: Egyptian Craftsmanship Meets Global Standards
hero.description: World-class garment manufacturing from Alexandria, Egypt. Competitive pricing, exceptional quality, and strategic logistics for international brands.

whyEgypt.title: Why Egyptian Manufacturing?
whyEgypt.subtitle: Strategic advantages that make Alexandria your ideal manufacturing partner

strategicLocation.title: Strategic Location
strategicLocation.desc: Alexandria port provides easy access to Europe, Middle East & Africa. Preferential trade agreements with EU and USA markets.

costCompetitive.title: Cost Competitive
costCompetitive.desc: 30-40% cost savings versus Western manufacturing without compromising quality. Maximize your margins while maintaining standards.

exportReady.title: Export Ready
exportReady.desc: ISO 9001:2015 certified. Full compliance with international standards and experienced in global shipping logistics.
